name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 053
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, Holy Pride Batman! Robin’s Gay, in a move that shocked some and was a, “yea no kidding” moment for others, DC’s Batman: Urban Legends #6 revealed Tim Drake, the 3rd iteration of Robin, as gay. This is a huge step towards inclusion in comics for DC; making such a prominent established character in the Batman franchise queer. An exciting step in the right direction for an industry that was marred in my childhood by scantily clad women superheroes with oversized breasts, and a machismo often reserved for football and frat parties.
